message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $130. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $115?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $115 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $125.  Let's split the difference and make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $125, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $118?
